scenes.description: MC section where Mori Calliope introduces the band members (The Dead Beats) following a performance.
MC section where Mori Calliope interacts with the audience, discusses concert etiquette (penlights), and addresses the stream viewers.

subtitles.original: Glad to be here.
subtitles.english: Glad to be here.

subtitles.original: Give it up for those guys,
subtitles.english: Give it up for those guys,

subtitles.original: and I want to introduce them to you as a matter of fact, alright?
subtitles.english: and I want to introduce them to you as a matter of fact, alright?

subtitles.original: So first of all, we had on the drums, it's Ishi Yuya!
subtitles.english: So first of all, we had on the drums, it's Ishi Yuya!

subtitles.original: かっこいいね！ Freaking cool.
subtitles.english: That's cool! Freaking cool.

subtitles.original: Next up,
subtitles.english: Next up,

subtitles.original: on the bass, it's Ego!
subtitles.english: on the bass, it's Ego!

subtitles.original: Ah, I'm jealous man. So cool.
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm jealous man. So cool.

subtitles.original: You know, I play a little bass myself, but I'm a beginner,
subtitles.english: You know, I play a little bass myself, but I'm a beginner,

subtitles.original: so I'm very much like "Ah, that's so cool."
subtitles.english: so I'm very much like "Ah, that's so cool."

subtitles.original: I want to be good at the bass someday. Next up we've got on the keys, it's Koushei!
subtitles.english: I want to be good at the bass someday. Next up we've got on the keys, it's Koushei!

subtitles.original: エモいねー。 So emotional.
subtitles.english: How emotional. So emotional.

subtitles.original: Wow, my gosh. My heart is fluttering.
subtitles.english: Wow, my gosh. My heart is fluttering.

subtitles.original: And last but certainly not least, on the guitar, we got Becky!
subtitles.english: And last but certainly not least, on the guitar, we got Becky!

subtitles.original: かっこいい！ Everyone's so cool.
subtitles.english: So cool! Everyone's so cool.

subtitles.original: Band saikou!
subtitles.english: The band is the best!

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: I'm counting on you!

subtitles.original: Nice. Now that I've introduced the band to you guys,
subtitles.english: Nice. Now that I've introduced the band to you guys,

subtitles.original: we're ready to get into the details about how to have fun at the Mori concert.
subtitles.english: we're ready to get into the details about how to have fun at the Mori concert.

subtitles.original: Now first, I want the whole venue to turn red,
subtitles.english: Now first, I want the whole venue to turn red,

subtitles.original: like the voltage of Hell is going up. Come on, give me red, give me red!
subtitles.english: like the voltage of Hell is going up. Come on, give me red, give me red!

subtitles.original: And when this red runs black...
subtitles.english: And when this red runs black...

subtitles.original: Yeah, yeah. Alright.
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah. Alright.

subtitles.original: Now listen to me, this is important. You turn the penlight into red
subtitles.english: Now listen to me, this is important. You turn the penlight into red

subtitles.original: when you feel super hyped, which is going to be all the time,
subtitles.english: when you feel super hyped, which is going to be all the time,

subtitles.original: but you know, if you overdo it, it's not as special.
subtitles.english: but you know, if you overdo it, it's not as special.

subtitles.original: Kind of like, you know, solo lives are rare, we don't get to do them all the time.
subtitles.english: Kind of like, you know, solo lives are rare, we don't get to do them all the time.

subtitles.original: But they become more special, so use it only when you're super hyped, okay?
subtitles.english: But they become more special, so use it only when you're super hyped, okay?

subtitles.original: Now then.
subtitles.english: Now then.

subtitles.original: Yeah, you guys are excited, I can tell.
subtitles.english: Yeah, you guys are excited, I can tell.

subtitles.original: Now let me hear something though. I want to know,
subtitles.english: Now let me hear something though. I want to know,

subtitles.original: where are you from?
subtitles.english: where are you from?

subtitles.original: USA! USA! USA! USA! Stop, man! You boneheads!
subtitles.english: USA! USA! USA! USA! Stop, man! You boneheads!

subtitles.original: Crazily enough, the only state that I heard was Oregon. Why?
subtitles.english: Crazily enough, the only state that I heard was Oregon. Why?

subtitles.original: No, but then I got a little bit of everybody in there.
subtitles.english: No, but then I got a little bit of everybody in there.

subtitles.original: So wherever you're from, thank you so much for coming out to see me.
subtitles.english: So wherever you're from, thank you so much for coming out to see me.

subtitles.original: It's very important to me. Thank you.
subtitles.english: It's very important to me. Thank you.

subtitles.original: You Dead Beats rock! You know that though.
subtitles.english: You Dead Beats rock! You know that though.

subtitles.original: Now, alrighty, also here's the thing though,
subtitles.english: Now, alrighty, also here's the thing though,

subtitles.original: we don't just have people here in the venue,
subtitles.english: we don't just have people here in the venue,

subtitles.original: we also have people watching on the internet, on stream!
subtitles.english: we also have people watching on the internet, on stream!

subtitles.original: What's up guys? Hello! I see you, I see you. Hi, hi, hi!
subtitles.english: What's up guys? Hello! I see you, I see you. Hi, hi, hi!

subtitles.original: I'm looking at you, Dead Beat at home, Dead Beat at home.
subtitles.english: I'm looking at you, Dead Beat at home, Dead Beat at home.

subtitles.original: We love you, we miss you. Hi!
subtitles.english: We love you, we miss you. Hi!

subtitles.original: "That's us," they say. "That's me, that's me."
subtitles.english: "That's us," they say. "That's me, that's me."

subtitles.original: Let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: Now, you guys... they have so many different chants.
subtitles.english: Now, you guys... they have so many different chants.

subtitles.original: Chat! Chat! Chat! Chat!
subtitles.english: Chat! Chat! Chat! Chat!

subtitles.original: Chat! Chat! Chat! Chat! That's you guys. Chat! Chat! Chat! Chat!
subtitles.english: Chat! Chat! Chat! Chat! That's you guys. Chat! Chat! Chat! Chat!

subtitles.original: Thank you so much! Chat! Chat!
subtitles.english: Thank you so much! Chat! Chat!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: Nice beat! いいね！
subtitles.english: Nice beat! Nice!

subtitles.original: Yeah, chat, chat... alright, time to stop that, time to...
subtitles.english: Yeah, chat, chat... alright, time to stop that, time to...

subtitles.original: Okay. Now that we've gotten that out of our system,
subtitles.english: Okay. Now that we've gotten that out of our system,

subtitles.original: you guys who are watching this stream,
subtitles.english: you guys who are watching this stream,

subtitles.original: have the opportunity to do the coolest thing right now.
subtitles.english: have the opportunity to do the coolest thing right now.

subtitles.original: Post your impressions on Twitter, okay? #CalliGrimoire
subtitles.english: Post your impressions on Twitter, okay? #CalliGrimoire

subtitles.original: No recording videos, but feel free to take lots of screenshots of me
subtitles.english: No recording videos, but feel free to take lots of screenshots of me

subtitles.original: doing silly stuff and singing and performing, okay?
subtitles.english: doing silly stuff and singing and performing, okay?

subtitles.original: But sadly, those of you watching on YouTube, I have some bad news for you.
subtitles.english: But sadly, those of you watching on YouTube, I have some bad news for you.

subtitles.original: It's all over, the free preview is over! And you know what?
subtitles.english: It's all over, the free preview is over! And you know what?

subtitles.original: We haven't even gotten to like the sixth or seventh most hype moment
subtitles.english: We haven't even gotten to like the sixth or seventh most hype moment

subtitles.original: that's going to happen tonight.
subtitles.english: that's going to happen tonight.

subtitles.original: Broke-gang, listen. I feel you. But, but,
subtitles.english: Broke-gang, listen. I feel you. But, but,

subtitles.original: make sure that you check out the link in the description below
subtitles.english: make sure that you check out the link in the description below

subtitles.original: and see if you can, if you can, you know...
subtitles.english: and see if you can, if you can, you know...

subtitles.original: Cop yourself... BUY IT! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Cop yourself... BUY IT! Yeah!

subtitles.original: I like that Dead Beat who's like "BUY IT!" Yeah!
subtitles.english: I like that Dead Beat who's like "BUY IT!" Yeah!

subtitles.original: You have the assertiveness I need.
subtitles.english: You have the assertiveness I need.

subtitles.original: Awesome, my freaking boneheads. Now then,
subtitles.english: Awesome, my freaking boneheads. Now then,

subtitles.original: listen up Dead Beats, we got to continue as much as I want to keep talking
subtitles.english: listen up Dead Beats, we got to continue as much as I want to keep talking

subtitles.original: so I can like chill for a minute. Listen,
subtitles.english: so I can like chill for a minute. Listen,

subtitles.original: today I brought a bunch of songs here to harvest your souls.
subtitles.english: today I brought a bunch of songs here to harvest your souls.

subtitles.original: It's my job, don't hate me.
subtitles.english: It's my job, don't hate me.
